item.title: Local Warming | Visualising Increasing Temperature In Barbados
item.description: The Question Barbados was always hot. Its a tropical paradise in the Caribbean its supposed to be hot but thanks to global warming it is hotter than ever. Exactly how hot you ask? The devil went to hell to escape the heat in Barbados — You cant hear Jimmy (@CorinBailey) July 25, 2018 That sums it up perfectly, so my question isnâ€™t if Barbados is getting warmer, that is a definite.
